text: Ashamed (Persian: Sharmsar) is a 1950 Iranian drama film directed by Esmail Kushan.Issari p.133 ==Cast== * Abdullah Baghaie * Alexander Bijanian * Hossein Daneshavar * Delkash * Mohammad Ali Zarandi == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. title: Ashamed (1950 film)
